mapper.select: select p.post_nm, p.post_idx, c.cat_nm, DATE_FORMAT(p.post_regdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as post_regdate FROM post p join category c ON c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx WHERE p.m_idx=#{param1} and p.wanted=#{param2} and p.post_deldate is null AND (SELECT count(*) FROM post p2 JOIN dream.match mat ON p2.post_idx=p.post_idx AND mat.post_idx=p2.post_idx) > 0
select distinct p.post_nm, p.post_idx, c.cat_nm, DATE_FORMAT(p.post_regdate, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') as post_regdate, p.wanted from post p join category c on c.cat_idx=p.cat_idx where p.post_idx = #{idx};

SELECT match_idx, post_idx, m_nm, m_photo, match_yn, m_idx FROM dream.match mat join member mem ON
mem.m_idx=mat.mentor_idx
mem.m_idx=mat.mentee_idx
WHERE mat.post_idx=#{arg0}
